thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Santander Q4 Net Profit At 1.54 Billion Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Santander Q4 Net Profit At 1.54 Billion Euros
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Santander:
* FY NET INTEREST INCOME 34.30 BILLION EUROS * FY NET PROFIT 6.62 BILLION EUROS * Q4 NET PROFIT 1.54 BILLION EUROS * Q4 NET INTEREST INCOME 8.61 BILLION EUROS * FULLY-LOADED CORE TIER 1 CAPITAL RATIO 10.84 PERCENT AT END-DEC
* NON-PERFORMING LOANS 4.08 PERCENT AT END-DEC * RETURN ON TANGIBLE EQUITY (ROTE) 10.41 PERCENT IN Q4 * SAYS REMAINS CONFIDENT IT WILL ACHIEVE ALL TARGETS FOR 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
